page.title: 04Brookside
page.content: Our school,{Brookside,}was built in 1973. It is quite new and has a head teacher and 10 teachers. With about 315 children. The average number in each class is 32. The school day starts at 9:00 am and ends at 3:30pm. The school is mixed, and has five infant classes and five junior classes including one mobile classroom. There is also a big hall, a kitchen, a library, and a courtyard. In this courtyard there are two ponds, and the sandpit for the younger childen. We have two playgrounds and three fields. There is a wendy house in the infant playground and a games hut in the junior playground. In our school we have a football and netball team.
